other_tests.findings: Initial undesirable weight gain after placement, but mental function continued to deteriorate.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Her ability to take oral medications decreased and she became increasingly less verbally responsive.

other_tests.findings: Noted difficulty eating, including pushing food away and refusal to swallow.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Eating problems persisted after her diabetic hyperosmolar coma.

other_tests.findings: Agreement on comfort care, including a do not resuscitate order, but uncertainty about feeding tube.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Eventually, a decision to remove the feeding tube was made after four years of use.
